page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ROBIN TOMKINS I'M ROBIN TOMKINS I'M 9 YEARS OLD . TODAY I GOT UP AT 8 .00A.M.. THEN MUMMY AND I TOOK ANTHONY MY BROTHER TO SCHOOL. AFTER THAT WE WENT TO THE DOCTORS, HE SAID THAT I HAD A VIRUS LIKE GLANDULAR FEVER. AFTER THAT MUMMY PICKED UP OUR CLEANER AND WE WENT HOME AND SHE WENT TO BADMINTON. WHEN MUMMY ARRIVED HOME WE HAD OUR LUNCHBUT FIRST SHE TOOK OUR CLEANER HOME. FOR LUNCH WE HAD BREAD AND CHEESE. AT THREE O CLOCK WE PICKED MY BROTHER UP FROM SCHOOL. THEN WE WENT TO SEE MY GRANDMA. WHEN WE CAME HOME WE HAD TEA,WE HAD SAUSAGE ROLL, SWEET CORN AND CHIPS. AFTER TEA I FED MY RABBIT AND GUINEA PIG THEN I WATCHED TELEVISION.
